description:
Benchmarks are used to measure reference data points of how a database performs under load. In this talk we learn more about DVDStore benchmark

In this talk we learn about DVDStore and how to benchmark PostgreSQL using the various implementations of DVDStore 1. Tomcat/JDBC 2. Web Server/PHP 3. Postgres Stored Procedure services
short_description: Benchmarks are used to measure reference data points of how a database performs under load. In this talk we learn more about DVD
title: Jignesh Shah: DVDStore Benchmark and PostgreSQL
